attributes.action: Pay back benefits once you get a job
attributes.additional_details:
When you are unemployed you can claim a range of benefits which will be classed as a loan, similar to a student load. You decide how much you need and for what - With limits.
Once you get a job and start earning a level of pay you start to repay this debt.
This would make the unemployed accountable for what they get and reduce the overall DWP bill
